procedural_fairness: pleadings must contain a concise statement of material facts but not evidence
striking out claims that are scandalous, frivolous, or vexatious
application_details: Further Amended Statement of Claim includes excessive evidence and lacks clarity
decision_reasoning: Some parts meet pleading requirements, while others are struck out for being evidence or irrelevant
Claims like 'mental agony' require physical symptoms
result_of_case: Court allowed some claims to proceed while striking out others
Plaintiffs were granted time to amend their statement further
